variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB1A
variable.description: Q1a. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? You are treated with less courtesy than other people [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1B
variable.description: Q1b. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? You are treated with less respect than other people [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1C
variable.description: Q1c. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? You receive poorer service than others at restaurants [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1D
variable.description: Q1d. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? People act as if they think you are not smart [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1E
variable.description: Q1e. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? People act as if they are afraid of you [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1F
variable.description: Q1f. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? People act as if they think you are dishonest [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1G
variable.description: Q1g. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? People act as if they think you are not as good as they are [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1H
variable.description: Q1h. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? You are called names or insulted [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB1I
variable.description: Q1i. How often each of the following things happen to you in your day-to-day life? You are threatened or harassed [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
variable.value: Less than a few times a year

variable.name: DISB2A
variable.description: Q2a. Thinking over these day-to-day experiences, what is the main reason for this treatment [discrimination]? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB2B
variable.description: Q2b. Thinking over these day-to-day experiences, what is the main reason for this treatment [discrimination]? Specify other reason: [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3A
variable.description: Q3a. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually speak up? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3A1
variable.description: Q3a1. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually speak up? How much? (circle value given to response) [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3B
variable.description: Q3B. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually accept it? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3B1
variable.description: Q3b1. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually accept it? How much? (circle value given to response) [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3C
variable.description: Q3c. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually ignore it? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3D
variable.description: Q3d. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually try to change it? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.description: Q3e. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually keep it to yourself? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3F
variable.description: Q3f. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually work harder to prove them wrong? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3L
variable.description: Q3l. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: other reaction? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB4
variable.description: Q4. Thinking back over these types of day-to-day experiences, compared with when you were younger, are they: [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB5
variable.description: Q5. When you have had day-to-day experiences like these, would you say they have been: [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB3C1
variable.description: Q3c1. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually ignore it? How much? (circle value given to response) [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.description: Q3f1. When you receive lesser or unfair treatment in your day-to-day life: do you usually work harder to prove them wrong? How much? (circle value given to response) [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB6
variable.description: Q6. Overall, how much has day-to-day discrimination interfered with you having a full and protective life? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB7
variable.description: Q7. Overall, how much harder has your life been because of day-to-day discrimination? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]

variable.name: DISB8
variable.description: Q8. Because of the shade of your skin color, do you think white people treat you: (???) than other blacks? [Visit 9] [Discrimination Form]
